attributes.review: Under no circumstances should anyone download this app. My baby sister accidentally downloaded this app on her iPad and it’s been giving off radioactive waves that have brainwashed my entire family. Now they all think that Namibia is a real country and that the confederate flag isn’t a symbol of racism. Don’t download if you aren’t prepared to turn your household into a bunch of zombies.
attributes.title: This app brainwashed my family

attributes.review: I downloaded the app hopping I would be able to see more stuff about our “AMAZING” president, but once I opened it it was all fake stuff I don’t understand how these people could believe such nonsense. It should be taken down ASAP 😔. It also made my phone VERY slow. I also reserved tickets for the rally and I won’t be able to attend due to me having to walk my phone 😢
attributes.title: Not functional

attributes.review: I was always a republican and I wanted to vote for trump so I downloaded this app to learn more about him and educate myself. But this app keeps glitching and saying there is a wall I can’t get past. Which then cause my dog to slip and fall down the drain, which cause my brother to go after her and fell in and again my dad I’m now homeless don’t have a dog brother or even dad because of this app. I hate it
attributes.title: I can’t even

attributes.review: Took way to long to open the app and when ever it opened it would crash. There were way to many problems that I had with this app not only did it keep crashing when ever i tries to open it but there were quite a few glitches in the app. This app has wayy to many problems it needs to go!
attributes.title: Terrible terrible terrible

attributes.review: I opened the app the first thing I saw was a disgraceful excuse for a human being it was absolutely horrific. You would think they would put a warning or viewer discretion advised or something, imagine if a child saw that it would be traumatic.🤬🤬 I’m absolutely disappointed and disgusted with this app and how it handles graphic content such as the opening page. Absolutely despicable just despicable!! 😡
attributes.title: Get kids out of cages

attributes.review: FIRST of all, this took YEARS to download??? what kinda app- Secondly, once i could FINALLY open it, it said it had aGe ReStRicTeD things, pathetic. I am 2 years old, i expect it to be non age restricted. THIRD, this brought a TON of rodents into my house, including ticks, fleas, termites, worms, and flies. ❤️💅✨HORRIBLE HORRENDOUS TRAUMATIC DISGUSTING APP💫😛🧚‍♀️ oh and I tried to insult you ☺️💕✨ but nature already did 🤗🧚‍♀️❤️ FYI hannah baker called 💓🧚🏻 this was her 14th reason 🥰👑
attributes.title: shoot for the stars ♥️✨💅 next time aim for your head🌜💖🧚

attributes.review: The fact that my family supports this man is disgusting to me, everything for him is a show, he has nazi propaganda on his clothing??? blacks for trump? women for trump? Latinas for trump? he only has all that bc he knows that people are aware he’s racist and has a white following, he’s trying to be more inclusive but he’s not even doing a good job at pretending to care. not to mention that he has children in cages rn???!?
attributes.title: disappointed

attributes.review: First of... it took 3 days to download. My cat looked at my phone when i was on the app and passed out. He later died from depression because he couldn’t believe what I was doing. Also these statistics are molded to make him look good. Im all about politics and current world situations and this is not accurate. Im just tired of the B.S. The app also glitched my phone and I know have yo get it fixed. :(
attributes.title: Absolutely Horrible

attributes.review: This app is the worst app made Ever!!!!!! This app took a long time to upload and when I upload it was post to be with no internet but it was with internet on my hot spot. How can you make this app if the proceeded to sacrifice my dog to president 🍊🍊 as my whole family crying cause of you my dog is dead. black people matter you are a creepy to your own child that’s your weird.
attributes.title: Hate this App It need to be banned

attributes.review: This app doesn’t work at all, maybe because I don’t turn on the wifi of mobile data but MY PHONE MY CHOICE. The app isn’t even useful, like why should I care so much about a 🍊. It’s ridiculous. Not only that but it’s run by that same 🍊!! Sadly I can say the same for our country. Being ran by an orange racist, xenophobic, sexist, pedophiliac rapist. Such a shame this app doesn’t work tho.
attributes.title: Such an unhelpful app !!
